"New training of the Ruins":
"Hey, humans have this thing called
compatibility right? For me, only the D-arker
has bad compatibility. Although it is difficult
to search for someone with good compatibility
and chemistry, I think that your compatibility
with D-arker is not too bad! Please defeat 70
D-arkers at Super Hard, and allow me to take
this as a reference for my training at the ruins!
*Target D-arker of Lv.61 and above,
at the Ruins"

"なあ、ヒトには相性ってモンがあるだろ？
オレ、ダーカーってのだけは
抜群に相性悪いんだよ、これが。
オレの場合、相性いいヤツを探すほうが
難しいけど、おたくはダーカーとの相性
悪くないと思うんだよな！
スーパーハードでダーカーを７０体撃破して
オレの遺跡での修行の参考にさせてくれ！
※遺跡エリア限定
Lv.61～のダーカーが対象"
